reqs:
Processes underlying the ability to learn and perform motor skills. We will take an empirical approach to evaluating motor learning theories and principles. We will also critically evaluate the application of these principles to sports. The quality and quantity of practice will be considered with respect to early learning as well as elite performance. This will be a seminar course with a significant participation component.
*Course will be held in War Memorial Gym, room 100.
description: Processes underlying the ability to learn and perform motor skills.
